net.kuujo.vertigo.util.serialization

Interface Serializer


  • public interface Serializer
    Json serializer.

    Vertigo serializers serialize objects to Vert.x JsonObject instances for easy passage over the Vert.x event bus.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • serializeToBytes

        <T> byte[] serializeToBytes(T object)
        Serializes an object to Json. If an error occurs during serialization, a SerializationException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to serialize.
        Returns:
        A Json representation of the serializable object.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - If an error occurs during serialization.

      • deserializeBytes

        <T> T deserializeBytes(byte[] json,
                     Class<T> type)
        Deserializes an object from Json. If an error occurs during deserialization, a DeserializationException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        json - A Json representation of the serializable object.
        type - The type to which to deserialize the object.
        Returns:
        The deserialized object.
        Throws:
        DeserializationException - If an error occurs during deserialization.

      • deserializeBytes
